title: Virtual Assistant (High-Level Online Operations)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a high-level, resourceful Virtual Assistant to help manage and grow key parts of an online social media business.

This isn’t a role for someone who just completes checklists. We’re looking for someone who:
 • Can take ownership of projects and make decisions.
 • Stays on top of digital social trends and tools.
 • Excels at organizing, researching, and executing high-level online tasks.

If you’re proactive, ambitious, and thrive in a fast-moving environment, keep reading.

What You’ll Do
 • Manage communications: emails, DMs, and outreach to partners/clients.
 • Research and organize information for digital projects and content.
 • Assist with social media (content ideas, scheduling, engagement).
 • Complete any virtual tasks asked upon completed at the highest level

What We’re Looking For
 • Excellent written and spoken English.
 • Proven experience handling online tasks for entrepreneurs or businesses.
 • Proactive problem-solver who doesn’t wait to be told what to do.
 • 2+ years of experience in digital marketing / social media growth
 • Reliable internet and ability to work US hours (or partial overlap).

How to Apply - Response to these questions:
1. Share links to your resume / social media accounts / digital work experience
2. What’s the hardest you’ve ever worked on something in your life, and why did you do it?
3. Why should we hire you out of the 1,000+ applicants we receive?
